articles.title: New OpenAI job listings reveal the company’s robotics plans - TechCrunch
articles.description: New job listings reveal that OpenAI plans to develop sensors and other hardware for its upcoming robotics products.
articles.content: OpenAI disbanded its robotics department. Then, it brought it back. Now, through a social media post from its hardware director and newly published job descriptions, OpenAI is revealing more about it… [+2919 chars]

articles.title: Samsung Unpacked 2025: Galaxy S25, S25+, S25 Ultra price and key details leaked ahead of the launch event - HT Tech
articles.description: Samsung is set to unveil its Galaxy S25 series at Galaxy Unpacked 2025, with leaked prices, storage options, and colour options stirring anticipation worldwide ahead of launch.
articles.content: Samsung has announced that its annual Galaxy Unpacked event will take place on January 22, 2025, where it will reveal its flagship Galaxy S25 series. This includes the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and Ga… [+2395 chars]
